Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

history.provenance:
Acquisition:
Giuseppe Almanzi (b. 1801, d. 1860), bibliophile; his manuscript no. 182: his library including 322 medieval Hebrew manuscripts were purchased en bloc by the British Museum in October 1865 for £1,000 through Asher & Co., Berlin dealer to the British Museum (see 131-153): inscribed, folio [183v] (fse002v).
